text: What is the name of the monster that Viv defeats in the prologue?

What two things does Viv save from her burning cafe?
answer: The lockbox and the coffee machine

text: With who does Viv stay with while rebuilding the cafe after it burned down?
What is the name of Viv's greatsword?
Name two of the items in the leather satchel Viv carries when she enters Thune.
answer: accept any 2: notes, plans, hardtack, (platinum) chits, (precious) stones, (small, curious) device

text: When she enters Thune, Viv feels the witching rod draw her toward a building. What two words are on the sign over that building?

What color is Tandri's hair?
How much money does Viv offer to pay Tandri when she first applies for the assistant job? Be specific.
Name three of the items that Viv purchases for her shop when she and Tandri go to the Thune Market.
answer: accept any 3: (clay) plates, mugs, cups, (copper) kettles, (pewter) spoons, cutlery, utensil hanger, rug, (wrought-iron) tables, chairs, (wall) lanterns, cleaning supplies, (pastoral) paintings

What does Viv notice that the rattkin usually wears?
What 5-word question does Tandri ask Kellin the first time he enters Viv's shop?

answer: cinnamon roll (also accept: roll, soft bread)

text: When Pendry first introduces himself to Viv, what does he tell her his profession is?
Name 2 of the ingredients Thimble requests when he begins to bake his second treat for Legends & Lattes (later known as Thimblets).
answer: accept any 2: currants, walnuts, oranges, cardamom

text: Name 2 of the characters whom Viv thinks of as "the old crew."
answer: accept any 2: Fennus, Roon, Gallina, Taivus

text: What kind of being is Taivus? Be specific.

Name 2 of the food/drinks that Tandri brings to the celebratory picnic that she and Viv have at the park above the river.
answer: accept any 2: bread, cheese, preserves, sausage, brandy
